Package org.apache.wayang.core.platform

Class Platform

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.platform.Platform
Direct Known Subclasses:
FlinkPlatform, GiraphPlatform, JavaPlatform, JdbcPlatformTemplate, SparkPlatform, TensorflowPlatform
public abstract class Platform extends Object
A platform describes an execution engine that executes ExecutionOperators.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final JsonSerializer<Platform>
    jsonSerializer
    Default JsonSerializer implementation that stores the Class of the instance and then tries to deserialize by invoking the static getInstance() method.

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static Platform load(String platformClassName)
      Loads a specific Platform implementation. For platforms to interoperate with this method, they must provide a static, parameterless method getInstance() that returns their singleton instance.
      Parameters:
      platformClassName - the class name of the Platform
      Returns:
      the Platform instance

    • configureDefaults

      protected abstract void configureDefaults(Configuration configuration)
      Configure default settings for this instance, e.g., to be able to create LoadProfileToTimeConverters.
      Parameters:
      configuration - that should be configured

    • createExecutor

    • isSinglePlatformExecutionPossible

      public boolean isSinglePlatformExecutionPossible(ExecutionTask producerTask, Channel channel, ExecutionTask consumerTask)
      Tells whether the given constellation of producing and consuming ExecutionTask, linked by the Channel can be handled within a single PlatformExecution of this Platform
      Parameters:
      producerTask - an ExecutionTask running on this Platform
      channel - links the producerTask and consumerTask
      consumerTask - an ExecutionTask running on this Platform
      Returns:
      whether the ExecutionTasks can be executed in a single PlatformExecution

    • createLoadProfileToTimeConverter

      public abstract LoadProfileToTimeConverter createLoadProfileToTimeConverter(Configuration configuration)
      Returns:
      a default LoadProfileToTimeConverter

      Returns:
      the TimeToCostConverter
